item.description:
Hello Fellow Real Estate Investors!

Boston Real Estate Solutions LLC is proud to present Star Crossing, our newest property acquisition. Renamed Villa Madrid, this 176 unit residential apartment complex is the first of many commercial properties we are planning to invest in. At this meeting we'll be presenting the who, what, when, where and how of this particular real estate investment!

Whether you are new to real estate investing or are a seasoned veteran, we welcome you to join us in the networking and business opportunities.

The agenda for the night is below:

7:00pm - Open Networking
7:45pm - Star Crossing Presentation, Q&A
8:30pm - Open Networking

Come to learn and network! I hope to see you there! To RSVP on Facebook.com, go to http://www.facebook.c...

Make it a great day,
Ruben
item.name: Networking and Investment Property Presentation
